name: JUST A GHOST LOOKING FOR ITS BODY
name_original: JUST A GHOST LOOKING FOR ITS BODY
description:
This is just a short casual game about a ghost looking for its body in the afterlife.
You play the ghost and must make your way through the afterlife with nothing i.e. no body. You will have to make use of the flashing lights of the afterlife and your surroundings to make out where you are and where you are going. You must do this before time runs out or never achieve spiritual contentment.
This game was made for Ludum Dare 45.
